name: Superior Industries International, Inc.
description: Superior Industries International, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of aluminum wheels for the automotive industry, recognized for its commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability. Founded in 1957 and headquartered in Southfield, Michigan, the company has established itself as a key player in the global automotive supply chain. Superior Industries designs and produces a wide range of aluminum wheels for original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and aftermarket customers. With a focus on lightweight solutions, the company's products enhance vehicle performance and fuel efficiency while reducing environmental impact. Superior Industries employs advanced manufacturing techniques, including state-of-the-art casting and finishing processes, to deliver high-quality products that meet the rigorous standards of the automotive industry. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities across North America and has expanded its presence internationally. Superior Industries is dedicated to sustainable practices, implementing initiatives to reduce waste and energy consumption in its operations. The company’s vision is to innovate and lead in the production of aluminum wheels, contributing to the future of mobility and the automotive sector's evolution towards more sustainable practices.
